COMMAND.name: exit
COMMAND.help: Save profile configuration changes and exit current mode.

COMMAND.name: protect_management_frame
COMMAND.help: Enable or disable Protect Management Frame.

COMMAND.name: force_pmf
COMMAND.help: Enable or disable force to use PMF.

COMMAND.name: wep key
COMMAND.help: Set WEP key. Not required if passphrase is set.

PARAM.name: index
PARAM.help: Index at which key is installed.

COMMAND.ACTION: lua local fld = nil if "${index}" == "0" then fld = "dot11Profile.wepkey0" elseif "${index}" == "1" then fld = "dot11Profile.wepkey1" elseif "${index}" == "2" then fld = "dot11Profile.wepkey2" elseif "${index}" == "3" then fld = "dot11Profile.wepkey3" end clishCfgObjAdd ("dot11Profile", fld, "${key}") clishCfgObjAdd ("dot11Profile", "dot11Profile.defWepkeyIdx", "${index}")

COMMAND.name: wep passphrase
COMMAND.help: Set WEP passphrase to generate WEP key from.

PARAM.name: index
PARAM.help: Index at which key is installed.

PARAM.name: passphrase
PARAM.help: Passphrase to use to generate WEP Key.

COMMAND.ACTION:
lua local wepEncr = clishCfgAttrGet ("dot11Profile", "dot11Profile.groupCipher") local wepKeyLen = clishCmdExec (wepKeyLenGet, wepEncr) local wepPsk = "${passphrase}" local wepKey1 = clishCmdExec (wepKeyGenerate, wepPsk, wepKeyLen) wepPsk = wepPsk .. wepKey1 local wepKey2 = clishCmdExec (wepKeyGenerate, wepPsk, wepKeyLen) wepPsk = wepPsk .. wepKey2 local wepKey3 = clishCmdExec (wepKeyGenerate, wepPsk, wepKeyLen) wepPsk = wepPsk .. wepKey3 local wepKey4 = clishCmdExec (wepKeyGenerate, wepPsk, wepKeyLen)
clishCfgObjAdd ("dot11Profile", "dot11Profile.wepkey0", wepKey1) clishCfgObjAdd ("dot11Profile", "dot11Profile.wepkey1", wepKey2) clishCfgObjAdd ("dot11Profile", "dot11Profile.wepkey2", wepKey3) clishCfgObjAdd ("dot11Profile", "dot11Profile.wepkey3", wepKey4) clishCfgObjAdd ("dot11Profile", "dot11Profile.defWepkeyIdx", "${index}") clishCfgObjAdd ("dot11Profile", "dot11Profile.pskPassHex", "${passphrase}")

COMMAND.name: wpa wpa-password
COMMAND.help: WPA Password. Needed only if authentication is PSK and PSK+RADIUS

COMMAND.name: exit
COMMAND.help: Save wmm configuration changes and exit current mode.

COMMAND.name: cancel
COMMAND.help: Roll back advanced AP configuration changes

COMMAND.name: exit
COMMAND.help: Save advanced AP configuration changes and exit current mode.

COMMAND.name: beacon_interval
COMMAND.help: Set the time between beacon transmissions (in milliseconds).

COMMAND.name: dtim_interval
COMMAND.help: Set the interval between delivery traffic indication message.

PARAM.name: interval
PARAM.help: Delivery traffic indication message interval (in milliseconds).

COMMAND.name: rts_threshold
COMMAND.help: Set the Request to Send (RTS) threshold.

COMMAND.name: fragmentation_threshold
COMMAND.help: Set the maximum length of the frame.

COMMAND.name: preamble_mode
COMMAND.help: Set the 802.11b preamble type to be prepended to every frame

PARAM.name: preamble
PARAM.help: 802.11b preamble type to be prepended to every frame

COMMAND.name: protection_mode
COMMAND.help: Enable/disable RTS/CTS handshake before packet transmission.

COMMAND.name: short_retry_limit
COMMAND.help: Set the retry limit for frame retransmission on transmission failure.

COMMAND.name: long_retry_limit
COMMAND.help: Set the retry limit for frame retransmission on transmission failure.

PARAM.name: choice
PARAM.help: Enable or Disable power save mode.

COMMAND.name: tx_antennas
COMMAND.help: Set no of transmit antennas to use .

PARAM.name: antenna
PARAM.help: Set no of transmit antennas to use .

COMMAND.name: rx_antennas
COMMAND.help: Set no of receive antennas to use .

PARAM.name: antenna
PARAM.help: Set no of receive antennas to use ..

PARAM.name: choice
PARAM.help: Enable or Disable wireless frame aggregation in hardware

COMMAND.name: exit
COMMAND.help: Save WPS configuration changes and exit current mode.

PARAM.name: status
PARAM.help: Acess point on which WPS is to be configured WPS status.

COMMAND.name: exit
COMMAND.help: Save AP configuration changes and exit current mode.

COMMAND.name: profile
COMMAND.help: Set the 802.11 profile the AP will use.

COMMAND.name: exit
COMMAND.help: Save radio configuration changes and exit current mode.

COMMAND.name: channel
COMMAND.help: Set the channel used by radio.

PARAM.name: channel
PARAM.help: Channel number (or Auto to let system select).

COMMAND.name: default-transmit-power
COMMAND.help: Set default trans power for APs using this radio.

COMMAND.name: transmission_rate
COMMAND.help: Set Transmission Rate for the radio.

COMMAND.name: channel_spacing
COMMAND.help: Set channel spacing for the radio.

PARAM.name: channel_spacing
PARAM.help: Set Channel Spacing for the radio

COMMAND.name: exit
COMMAND.help: Save ACL configuration changes and exit current mode.

PARAM.name: ipaddress
PARAM.help: Set primary authentication server ip address.

PARAM.name: ipaddress
PARAM.help: Set secondary authentication server ip address.

COMMAND.name: retries
COMMAND.help: Authentication retries limit to radius server.

PARAM.name: retries
PARAM.help: Set retries limit to radius server.

COMMAND.name: cancel
COMMAND.help: Roll back AP ACL configuration changes

COMMAND.name: exit
COMMAND.help: Save AP ACL configuration changes and exit current mode.

PARAM.name: radio_no
PARAM.help: Radio No to add peer mac

PARAM.name: radio_no
PARAM.help: Radio No to add peer mac
